objective.label: Objective
objective.text: To obtain a position as a senior software developer for mobile applications that will enable me to use my diverse experience, educational background, and ability to work well with people in order to deliver powerful quantitative and feature rich software to the end-user.

positions.name: Senior Mobile Engineer
responsibilities: Boostrapped continuous delivery environment for both iOS and Android
Rearchitected mobile application to make efficient use of battery life and network bandwidth
Redesigned end-user experience as part of the company's re-branding
Managed app deployment to both Apple's App Store and Google's Play Store
Helped establish Agile process to mobile team
Help secure IRAPP government funding for business applications using NFC

positions.name: Java Software Developer (Cloud Applications)
responsibilities: Developed Cloud and Mobile-based solutions that extend the reach of Signiant products beyond traditional enterprise environments
Implemented product features from the user interface through to back end web services, using technologies such as Android, iOS, JavaScript, Java, and NoSQL solutions
Designed system components to align with high performance system architecture
Implemented interfaces among system components and with external systems, for example REST
Worked effectively within Agile software development team

positions.name: Senior Member of R&D
responsibilities: Lead the development of the company's new flagship online clinical image viewer using latest HTML5 technologies to develop a high performance viewer targeted for the web and mobile devices

Wrote, managed and peer-reviewed requirements, design and test plan documents for all team projects, working closely with stakeholders to ensure both company's best interest, and the integrity of the software
Architected new advanced visualization 3D application to integrate into large enterprise code base, working closely with UI designers to develop cutting edge, feature rich applications
Mentored new employees to adapt to company's culture, in a lead position on projects, and spearheading new software development practices
Developed support for multiple platforms including Mobile-Web, Android and iOS

positions.name: Intermediate Member of R&D
responsibilities: Worked in an agile team and managed projects from design through to deployment stages
Researched new open-source technologies to use in both client and server applications
Developed client-server based desktop applications in Java to meet the our client's workflow needs
Frequently volunteered to provide in-house demonstrations of new software modules to other departments, including field-analysts, project managers and stakeholders
Awarded for going "Beyond the Call of Duty" by providing expert opinion and hands-on aid to all projects, including projects outside my team

positions.name: Junior Member of R&D
responsibilities: Developed and maintained tight integrations with third party partners in with short turn-around time
Frequently communicated with clients to develop requirements for new software features
First-level contact for support for troubleshooting client issues, which included off-hour support for clients in Australia
Received the "Culture Creature" award for quickly adapting into company ecosystem, and upholding the software's integrity, while operating at high standards

positions.name: Research Assistant
responsibilities: Implemented stereo reconstruction and image segmentation using OpenCV
Developed and integrated segmentation modules with VTK/ITK in to in-house image viewer
Ported several 2D segmentation and 3D reconstruction code written in Python in to C/C++

positions.name: Research Assistant
responsibilities: Researched new background subtraction algorithms for surveillance videos
Implemented background subtraction algorithms in C/C++ for in-house video processing library
Implemented several video format (YUV to RGB) conversion algorithms for in-house library
Taught numerous classes on Object-Oriented design and development using Java and C/C++

positions.name: Quality Assurance Engineer (Internship)
responsibilities: Engineered integration and system test suites for Voice Application Server in Java and XML
Developed and maintained test plans documents based on business and software requirements

positions.name: Embedded Systems Developer (Internship)
responsibilities: Developed client applications using proprietary speech recognition engine for Windows Mobile
Enhanced embedded speech recognition products to meet their functional requirements

schools.name: Master of Engineering Sciences
responsibilities: M.E.Sc. in Biomedical Engineering
Thesis: Full 3D Integration of Stereo Laparoscope and Freehand Ultrasound Data
Advisor: Dr. Terry M. Peters Ph.D. FCCPM

schools.name: Bachelor of Electrical and Computer Engineering
responsibilities: Gold Medal Recipient as Top Graduating Student in Computer Engineering
Graduated from the Concordia University Cooperative Studies Program

items.title: Beyond the Call of Duty award at Intelerad Medical Systems
Culture Creature award at Intelerad Medical Systems
Fonds quebecois de la recherche sur la nature et les technologies (FQRNT)
Concordia University Engineering Gold Medal Award for Top Graduate
Final Year Project in Engineering, Third Place
